*edit not saying his behavior is right or that you re nagging just using the old walk mile in his shoes routine being new parent is tough for moms and dads you are both in uncharted territory it may take some time for you to adjust but both of you need to be patient with each other communication is absolutely key in the first few months of being parent be honest with each other and talk listen to what the other parent is saying and take step back if you begin to feel frustrated the first three months are the hardest when you are parent sit down with him while the baby is napping at some point and say you like his help with few things because you re so exhausted ask for few minimal things to get started one night week in bed while he tends to baby or at least one morning to sleep in maybe tends the toddler during early evening wake ups and few nights week he ll sleep in her room with her so can get some continuous rest things like that still do large portion of the work but every when you re both calm and can be attentive so perhaps after putting the baby down for bed or while the baby is napping approach the topic tell him that you do think he understands the amount of work that you re doing around the house and it feels unfair and then listen to him as well while was on maternity leave was so jealous of my husband getting to leave the house each day while was home with very clingy fussy baby did realize that he was very stressed at work as well and felt jealous of me being home all day so we both needed to work to see the other person challenges and feelings would also have an idea of some specific things or buckets of work that you could use help with so can he be in charge of dinner two days per week or in charge of grocery shopping or walking the dogs or bathtime during the week or whatever it is if he refuses to commit to anything think he needs to spend some understanding how difficult it is to be the primary caretaker and manager of the home tell him you want him to watch the baby for one full day while you are out hopefully that will give him an appreciation of how hard you are working and how it only fair that you get some help the sleep
